content.text:
# Anthidium edwardsii

| taxon = Anthidium edwardsii
| authority= Cresson, 1878
| synonyms = see text
}}
Anthidium edwardsii is a species of bee in the family Megachilidae, the leaf-cutter, carder, or mason bees.
Synonyms
Synonyms for this species include:[http://www.discoverlife.org/mp/20q?search=Anthidium+edwardsii Anthidium edwardsii - - Discover Life]
*Anthidium tricuspidum Provancher, 1896
*Anthidium hesperium Swenk, 1914
*Anthidium depressum Schwarz, 1927
